name: ✪ Sonic Jade Justice V.02 ✪
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Z to select and jump

↓ + spam Z = spindash (release ↓ arrow to launch)

Z + hold Z in midair = dropdash

Sonic Jade Justice is a classic sonic fangame by Xeno/CA5B, in the game you play through levels containing 2 acts and go through the levels and try defeat Eggman! Play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Fang/Snac and a DLC (not revealed) and play through the game and destroy Eggman once and for all! 

Want to see more? well go to our discord server!   https://discord.gg/D8jTfWH

DOWNLOAD OFFLINE VERSION:               https://wetransfer.com/downloads/0e04bdb2de2459feaf5772476991d7aa20201031231314/...
